snippet: Pittsburgh Steelers running back Isaac Redman will start Sunday’s season opener against Tennessee.
abstract: Pittsburgh Steelers running back Isaac Redman will start in season opener against Tennessee Titans; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh Steelers running back Isaac Redman will start Sunday’s season opener against Tennessee.

headline.main: Redman to Start in Steelers’ Backfield
